InventoryID: Paestum, from C. SpinaNon SepcifiedGaudo (1977), T. 1
Imagery Description: (a) Draped woman , holding thyrsus and mirror, [b) nude youth with 'skewer of fruit' and thyrsus, bending forward over r. foot raised on tendril
Additional Notes: Part of an altar is visible to the left on (a) and to the right on [b).
